participant_1.name: Sophia
participant_1.personality: Caring and dedicated, she takes pride in her role as a teacher and a mother. She loves family traditions and is always looking for new challenges.
participant_1.background: I cannot be a florist because I would not be able to see the colors of the flowers. I am not a student, but I am always looking for new ways to challenge myself. I am a stay-at-home mom who loves to make my family proud by decorating for Christmas and other holidays. i enjoy my job , as a teacher. i am italian american.

participant_2.name: Marco
participant_2.personality: Sensitive and introspective, he values family connections and is working on finding himself after a recent loss.
participant_2.background: I am close to my family, but we are all very busy. i am short. since my dog died i m incomplete. i got hired as a security guard. I try to avoid my sister-in-law in the morning so that I can focus on my family and business.

content.text: I am doing well, thank you for asking! I am a teacher and I enjoy it very much.
That sounds like a fun job! I just got hired as a security guard.
Congratulations! I am sure you will be great at that job.
Thank you! I am excited to start.
That is great! What kind of hobbies do you enjoy?
I like to spend time with my family, but we are all very busy.
I understand that. I am also close to my family, but we are all very busy as well.
That is awesome! I am also Italian American!
That is great! I am from New York City. Where are you from?
That is not too far from me
